## setup
```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readr)

treatments <- read_tsv("C:/Users/Spencer_C/Desktop/NRTSy/RPT_TREATMENT_DETAILS_VW_DATA_VIEW.tsv") |>
  clean_names()
```

```{r explore}
multis <- treatments |>
  count(treatment_date, infestation_area_id, scientific_name, sort  = TRUE) |>
  filter(n != 1) |>
  head(3) |>
  select(-4)

semi_join(treatments, multis) |>
  view()
  
```
